faculties_accepted: Faculty of Physics, Mathematics and Computer Science
Faculty of Electronical Engineering and Technology
Faculty of Chemical Engineering and Technology

SDE.notes: alternative assessments for semester 1 exchange can be arranged

visa_info: Visa is required for a stay of more than 90 days for Singaporean and Malaysians. Non-EU students wishing to study in Poland should apply for an entry visa. All students should legalize their stay exceeding 3 months by obtaining temporary residence permit after their arrival to Poland.

accommodations_info.University Accommodation: CUT does not guarantee accommodation to exchange students. Co-educative student on-campus housing refers to double rooms with shared bathrooms (each bathroom is shared by four students) and shared kitchen. Students may check-in in our dormitories a few days before semester starts.
accommodations_info.Private Accommodation: Students will have to source for their own private accommodation. Applicants who need accommodation should submit their accommodation application to CUTâ€™s International Relations Office before 30 May, regardless of whether the study period commences in winter or spring semester of the following academic year.
